subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Eddy Curry’s growth spurt as a player and the Knicks’ gradual revival have been in lockstep since the start of the season. Naturally, Curry’s latest feat secured a major milestone for his team and his coach.
snippet: Eddy Curry’s growth spurt as a player and the Knicks’ gradual revival have been in lockstep since the start of the season. Naturally, Curry’s latest feat secured a major milestone for his team and his coach.
